sub_title: Moving Product Management Forward 🎓| Product Leader | Professional Scrum Trainer | Author | Speaker

treasury_media.title: The Value Maximizers – Medium
treasury_media.description: The Value Maximizers - Robbin Schuurman and Chris Lukassen paired up in order to boost their mission of Growing Product Leaders and Improving the profession of Product Development.

treasury_media.title: 50 Tinten Nee
treasury_media.description: Nee zeggen is niet altijd even gemakkelijk en kan niet altijd op dezelfde manier. Nee zeggen is zelfs niet altijd mogelijk. Maar nee zeggen is wel ja zeggen tegen de juiste dingen. Een essentiële vaardigheid om je effectiviteit te vergroten als Product Owner met een key rol binnen Scrum. Hoe ga je als Product Owner om met je stakeholders? En hoe zeg je effectief nee? Op deze en diverse andere vragen geeft '50 tinten nee' antwoord, op 50 verschillende manieren.

projects.title: Manager Software Development (Ad Interim) @ CRV
projects.description: As Manager Software Development at CRV, I’m responsible for the software development Squads within CRV. While being HR-responsible for the people, I'm focussed on improving the success of the business unit 'Data', which is the software development, information products and data department within CRV. Our main objectives are to deliver more customer value in a shorter period of time, hereby improving our time-to-market and time-to-learn. My main focus is to co-create the new business unit Data, coach/train management, Product Owners, Scrum Masters and Squads.

projects.title: Agile Transformation Lead @ Evides
projects.description: As an Engagement Lead, Management Consultant and Trainer at Evides, I was responsible for leading the Agile Transformation. I've trained, coached and led the Agile transformation team, in order to succesfully transform the organization. Some of my responsibilities were; leading the Agile Transformation, coaching/consulting management and C-level, implementing Scaling concepts and coaching/training all the people involved in their new roles. I've also coached and consulted the organization regarding organizational redesign, team formation, Agile governance, Agile HR and Agile leadership.

projects.title: Agile Transformation at KPN
projects.description: As an Engagement Lead and Trainer at KPN, I’ve trained/coached all the people within an infrastructure migration and development program. I was responsible for coaching and consulting for Product Management, Program Management and the Scrum Teams. It was an interesting environment to work in, since the environment was a TI (Technical Infrastructure) environment and not an ICT environment. I've led the Agile Transformation within the program and also implemented Scaling practices from SAFe.

projects.title: Agile Transformation at ANWB
projects.description: As an Agile Coach and Trainer at ANWB, I started coaching at ANWB within the Agile Transformation Team, after a while, we decided to decentralize the Agile Transformation and assign an Agile Coach to the different business units. After the decentralization, I was responsible for leading the Agile Transformation within the department ICT Infrastructure & Services. Within this department I led the Agile Transformation, trained/coached ICT IIS management and its Scrum Teams.

profile_positions.description:
Whether you are a product company or a professional services company, a substantial part of your value proposition and customer experience will be software. Today’s organizations have broadly adopted an Agile mindset and Agile methodologies enabling efficient delivery of software. However, delivering something of value to customers remains a major challenge for many organizations. Therefore, they need to reinvent themselves in such a way that the power trickles down to the product teams and people. These are the people who have the knowledge to make the best decisions, but this has exposed a new kind of problem. The need for product leadership.

Product Management is a complex, yet amazing profession. Product Managers require a broad range of capabilities, knowledge, skills and competences. How Product Management is defined and executed greatly depends on the organization, type of product, career pathways, the industry and many other factors. This however can change with the creation of the Professional Product ManagementTM Framework. Based on decades of Product Management experience in leading and transforming Product organizations, we have designed the Professional Product ManagementTM Framework, which covers all areas of Product Management.

Being the Head of Product - Professional Product Management Services, I am responsible for:
- Product Management
- Product Portfolio Management
- Product Discovery & Innovation
- Product Finances
- Product Marketing
- Maximising the Product's value (e.g. Revenues and Customer Satisfaction)
profile_positions.title: Head of Product | Product Leader | Professional Scrum Trainer | Author

profile_positions.description: As a Professional Scrum Trainer at Scrum.org, I'm regularly delivering Professional Scrum Trainings. Some of my regular trainings are; the Professional Scrum Master Training, Professional Scrum Product Owner Training, Professional Scrum Foundation Training and Professional Agile Leadership Training. Besides the Professional Scrum trainings, I also deliver Agile Management/Leadership trainings regularly.

volunteer_experiences.description:
As a Senior Lifeguard at 's-Gravenzandse Vrijwillige Reddingsbrigade me and a large crew of lifeguards are responsible for the safety of all visitors of 's-Gravenzande beach. As a Senior Lifeguard I'm responsible for the day-by-day planning and coordinating of our lifeguards.

With our 100+ lifeguards, 7km beach, lifeguard stations, boats, cars and jetski's, we've got some great material to guard 's-Gravenzande beach.
